name: WNRS x Bumble Date
level1: What was your first impression of me on Bumble vs. IRL?
How would you describe what you think my type is in three words?
What did you think about my first message?
Between the two of us, Who seems like the better texter? Explain.
level2: What dating advice would you give your younger self?
How old do you feel, emotionally?
Will I find your ex on your Instagram feed? Why or why not?
What's the most embarrassing thing that's ever happened to you on a date?
Finish the sentence: Dating is __________. (Both Players)
What did the people who raised you teach you about love?
What has being single taught you about yourself, if anything?
What's your least favorite question to be asked on a date? What do you wish you were asked more?
What are you not giving enough time to, currently?
When's the last time you surprised yourself?
What about my Bumble profile made you swipe right?
Admit something: What could you have done better in your previous relationship(s)?
Admit something: Is there an image of yourself you try to project on a first date that you wish you could let go of?
Wild Card Write down a dating pet peeve. (30 seconds) Compare.
Wild Card Write down the three most important things to you in a relationship. (30 seconds) Compare.
Wild Card Create your own question.
level3: What's the most attractive quality about me that isn't physical?
How accurately did my Bumble profile reflect who I am IRL?
Wild Card Based on what you've learned, rewrite each other's Bumble bios. (30 seconds) Compare.
